exceptions.exn: In environment b, k, m : nat H : 2 <= b Hdiv : k │ m Hneq0 : k <> 0 H0 : forall b : nat, 2 <= b -> forall k : nat, k <> 0 -> forall m : nat, alpha_nat b k │ alpha_nat b m -> k │ m Unable to unify "exists p : nat, k * m = p * ?M2292" with "exists p : nat, alpha_nat b m = p * alpha_nat b k".

original: intros H. split. - intros Hdiv. destruct (eq_nat_dec k 0) as [Heq0 | Hneq0]. + subst. apply Nat.divide_0_r. + apply alpha_nat_divides_k_ge_1 with (b := b). * auto. * auto. * auto. - intros Hdiv. destruct (eq_nat_dec k 0) as [Heq0 | Hneq0]. + subst. apply Nat.divide_0_r. + apply alpha_nat_divides_k_ge_1 with (b := b) (m := k * m). * auto. * auto. * rewrite alpha_nat_mono with (i := n) (j := n + m) by lia. apply Nat.le_lt_trans with (alpha_nat b (m + m)). -- apply alpha_nat_ge_n; lia. -- apply alpha_nat_inc; auto.
